title: Step 4 - Assess and Manage Re-identification Risk
summary: Evaluate the residual risk of re-identification in the synthetic dataset using quantitative and qualitative assessment methods. Proceed only if risk is very low.
checklist: Apply re-identification risk metrics suitable for synthetic data.
Compare synthetic and real datasets for similarity and potential linkage.
Review results against the 'very low' threshold as defined in the Framework.
If risk exceeds threshold, adjust synthesis parameters and retest.
Document outcomes and sign-off by the responsible governance body.

decisions.question: What is the residual re-identification risk level?
Is data utility still acceptable after mitigation?

governance_intent: Ensure synthetic data satisfies 'very low risk' before release.
